accordionItems.title: Digital Strategy & Consulting
accordionItems.content: This is the first item's accordion body. It is shown by default, until the collapse plugin adds the appropriate classes that we use to style each element.

accordionItems.title: Experience Design
accordionItems.content: This is the second item's accordion body. You can modify any of this with custom CSS or overriding our default variables. It's also worth noting that just about any HTML can go within the accordion body.

accordionItems.title: Web & Application Development
accordionItems.content: This is the third item's accordion body. Nothing is automatically shown when using the accordion plugin, so you can use the accordion body to contain text, images, or any other content.
